fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
inter_groups: Intergroup on  "Common Goods and Public Services".
eu_initiatives: Shale gas, fossil fuels, climate change, factory farming, GMOs, water as a human right, public water management
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission Expert Group on the Implementation of the Drinking Water Directive (98/83/CE)#E03030#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3030#Observer#C
goals__remit:
Food & Water Europe is the European programme of Food & Water Watch, a nonprofit organisation based in the United States. 
 
Food & Water Europe champions healthy food and clean water for all. We stand up to corporations that put profits before people and advocate for a democracy that improves people’s lives and protects our environment.
relevant_communication: Website and social media, events, meetings and publication of reports
legal_status: US registered charity with a "centre d’opération" in Belgium
